title: Creating an Equation
text: The supplementary angles add to $$180$$ and have a difference of $$88$$ degrees. So, we have: $$x+y=180, x-y=88$$

title: Elimination
text: We can eliminate $$y$$ from this equation by adding them together. We get $$2x=268$$.

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$x=\frac{268}{2}=134$$. Plugginig this into an original equation, we get $$y=46$$.
